***JOHNSON SCHOOL AND GRADUATE STUDENTS ONLY***: Add/Drop Dates: Johnson Students - January 18th at 8:00am to January 28th at Noon. Non-Johnson Students: January 28th at 4:00pm to February 4th at 4:00pm. You may add or drop a full semester class after February 4th with permission of the faculty. A late fee of $100.00 will be charged for each add or drop transaction. If you are dropping after March 11th you will also receive a "W" on your transcript in addition to the late fees. Students have until the end of the Add/Drop Period to indicate the grade-option choice for full semester courses; for half-semester courses, students must indicate their grade-option choice at pre-enrollment, or if the course is added during the Add/Drop Period, they must indicate their preference at that time.

Non-Johnson students must see their college registrar regarding policies connected with adding/dropping a second half Johnson School class. A petition may be required. Add/Drop Dates: Johnson Students - March 14th at 8am to March 16th at 4:00pm. Non-Johnson Students: March 17th at 12noon to March 18th at 4:00pm. You may add or drop a second-half class after March 18th with permission of the faculty. A late fee of $100.00 will be charged for each add or drop transaction. If you are dropping after April 8th you will also receive a "W" on your transcript in addition to the late fees.
